name: G+ black(penguindrum)
description:
Background image is from the official wetsite of anime penguindrum.

Black. Best resolution is 1280x800.
Flexible-width with black background.
Individual post is displayed separately with rounded corner.

黑色调，最佳分辨率1280x800，
自适应宽度，默认是企鹅罐的背景图~有待添加~
每条post圆角分开显示。
圈外信息提示默认隐藏
————
note: 之前有安装过的，请把旧的删掉，刷新页面后重新安装~
note2: 如果页面略卡，试试不透明。
